text:
="preserve">Jaan Rääts (15 October 1932  – 25 December 2020) was an Estonian composer. He worked on movie scores in the 1960s and 1970s. He became a member of the Estonian Composer's Union in 1957. He was born in Tartu, Estonia. He composed the movie scores for "Ohtlikud mängud" (1974) and "Aeg elada, aeg armastada" (1976).
Rääts died on 25 December 2020 in Tallinn, Estonia at the age of 88.
